original_text: You can be sure about this: If anyone has sex in a wrong way, that person does not belong to God's people. Nobody who does any kind of disgusting thing belongs to God's people. People who want many things just to please themselves are like people who worship an idol. They also do not belong to God's people. Nobody like that belongs to the kingdom where Christ and God rule. They will not receive the good things that God has prepared for his people.
korean_text: 너희도 정녕 이것을 알거니와 음행하는 자나 더러운 자나 탐하는 자 곧 우상 숭배자는 다 그리스도와 하나님의 나라에서 기업을 얻지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: You can be sure about this:
If anyone has sex in a wrong way,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 갖는다면,

sentences.original_text: that person does not belong to God's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 하나님의 백성에게 속하지 않아.

sentences.original_text: Nobody who does any kind of disgusting thing
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 종류의 역겨운 일을 하는 사람은 누구도

sentences.original_text: People who want many things just to please themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 자신을 기쁘게 하기 위해 많은 것을 원하는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: are like people who worship an idol.
They also do not belong to God's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 역시 하나님의 백성에게 속하지 않아.

sentences.original_text: Nobody like that belongs to the kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 사람은 누구도 그 나라에 속하지 않아

sentences.original_text: They will not receive the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 좋은 것들을 받지 못할 거야

sentences.original_text: that God has prepared for his people.
